description:
This course will help you to create your marketing plan.

It includes a short introduction to Marketing and the explanation of the marketing plan development process in 5 steps:

  1. Context
  2. Analysis
  3. Strategy
  4. Planning
  5. Managing

At the end of this course you will be able to create your own marketing plan.

Laurent delivers courses that are really simple and pragmatic enabling direct implementation no matter student's background.

From the same instructor:

  1. Create a Damn Good Business Plan !? https://www.udemy.com/create-a-damn-good-business-plan/
  2. How to Draft a Business Plan? https://www.udemy.com/how-to-draft-a-business-plan/
title: Marketing Plan made easy!
